Member Function Documentation

static get ( $  path,
$  default = false,
$  stripTags = false 
) [static]

get Retrieves a value by recursive lookup using the keypath

NOTE: To retrieve a setting not stored in the settings YAML but in the database, use a keypath with a prefix of "dynamic", such as "dynamic.My Setting"

Exceptions:
InvalidKeyPathException- if the keypath is invalid or if the setting is undefined
Parameters:
(Keypath|string)$keypath
mixed(optional) $default
mixed(optional) $stripTags - if true, strip all tags, if false, strip none, if strip, those are the allowable tags (pass to striptags())
Returns:
mixed $value
Author:
Matt Brewer

static load_dynamic_system_settings (  ) [static]

load_dynamic_system_settings PharosPHP uses several constants in code that are in fact dynamic settings from the database. This method loads those dynamic settings into the system as constants

Returns:
void
Author:
Matt Brewer
